name: Plush Elephant Toy
details: Soft and cuddly plush elephant toy perfect for bedtime snuggles. Made with high-quality materials and safety-tested for infants and toddlers.

name: Wooden Alphabet Blocks
details: Set of wooden alphabet blocks featuring colorful letters and numbers. Helps children learn the alphabet, numbers, and basic spelling in a fun and interactive way.

name: Musical Baby Rattle
details: Musical baby rattle with colorful beads that make soothing sounds when shaken. Helps stimulate auditory senses and develop fine motor skills in infants.

name: Activity Play Gym
details: Interactive activity play gym with hanging toys, mirrors, and crinkle fabrics. Promotes sensory exploration, tummy time, and gross motor development in babies.

name: Colorful Stacking Rings
details: Set of colorful stacking rings in different sizes. Helps develop hand-eye coordination, spatial awareness, and problem-solving skills in infants and toddlers.

name: Interactive Storybook
details: Interactive storybook with touch-and-feel textures, lift-the-flap surprises, and peek-a-boo windows. Encourages early literacy skills and imagination in young children.

name: Baby Teething Toy
details: BPA-free baby teething toy made with soft silicone material. Features textured surfaces and easy-to-grasp handles to soothe sore gums and promote oral development.

name: Pull-Along Wooden Duck
details: Adorable wooden duck pull toy with colorful wheels and flapping wings. Encourages walking, coordination, and imaginative play in toddlers.

name: Shape Sorting Cube
details: Classic shape sorting cube with 12 colorful shapes and a sturdy wooden frame. Helps develop fine motor skills, shape recognition, and problem-solving abilities.

name: Baby Sensory Ball
details: Soft and squishy sensory ball with various textures and patterns. Stimulates tactile senses, hand-eye coordination, and exploration in infants and toddlers.
